op-1.title: (S)IGNIS
op-1.subtitle: Fire prevention and management services
op-1.description1: This project is focussed in the development of a fire risk model and a web platform to visualize data related with fires, including the obtained model and allow the user the interaction with it. This project has been thougth as a tool for helping fire prevention and management.
op-1.description2: We use Django (Back End) and AngularJs (Front end). As a Geographic Information System project, we use Geoserver and PostGIS.
op-1.team: University of applied Science of Karlsruhe, Germany

op-2.title: TMCompanies
op-2.subtitle: Relation between companies and Gross Domestic Product in Spain from 2008 to 2017
op-2.description1: The purpose of this project is to collect, develop and analyze statistical data, and construct several suitable representations about this data, explaining a history, what is happened. We want to explain a little part of the business world in Spain along the crisis.
op-2.description2: It is written in Javascript with AngularJs, using Material.
op-2.team: University of applied Science of Karlsruhe, Germany

op-3.title: Angular portfolio
op-3.subtitle: Code example of an Angular portfolio with products.
op-3.description1: Whether you're a UX designer, freelance writer, or photographer, an impressive online portfolio is critical for impressing potential clients, and landing future jobs.
op-3.description2: A digital portfolio enables you to cultivate and display your very best work -- additionally, if you don't have a ton of prior experience in the industry, a portfolio can help you display your skills and talent with mock projects.
